    • Constructor Detail

      • MagicGuidedProjectileScript

        public MagicGuidedProjectileScript(@NotNull
                                   @NotNull com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.DamagingProjectileAPI proj,
                                   com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.CombatEntityAPI target)
        Initializer for the guided projectile script
        Parameters:
        proj - The projectile to affect. proj.getWeapon() must be non-null.
        target - The target missile/asteroid/ship for the script's guidance. Can be null, if the script does not follow a target ("ONE_TURN_DUMB") or to instantly activate secondary guidance mode.
